page.title: 20School Equipment
page.content: For art we use marvin glue which is white but it dries clear and shiney.We have paint in a kind of washing up bottle which sqeezes out the colour we need.We also use crayons and felt tips.In our maths lessons we use Fletcher text books,counters,cubes, calculaters,scales,weights,clocks, and this computer.To help us write we use pencils,italic pens,rubbers and sharpeners and we write on either plain or lined paper. In our music lessons we use marracas, tambourines,drums, wood blocks, claves and chime bars. When we play games we use bats and large and small balls. We often play non_stop cricket or roundersin the summer and football and netball in winter. By members of the Sweenie Class.
